features: Create and customize your companion (look, personality, role)
Keeps a journal of meaningful moments
outcomes: Conversations that build over time instead of restarting from scratch
forbidden: Avoid therapy/medical framing, diagnoses, or treatment claims
Avoid 'no limits' implying unsafe/sexual/under-18 content; keep PG-13
Avoid absolute promises like 'remembers everything'; say 'remembers important details' / 'keeps context'

cta.headline: Companion AI
cta.primary_text: Meet Companion AI: a companion that listens, remembers important details, and grows with you. Text, voice, and video.
